Panzer::

She kept moving her weapon back and forth from one to the 
other. "Yes, I am a maximal. Who are you and where did you come from?"
Her tone of voice showed she was confidience as well as curiosity.  


-- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Attilla/Luzbel:
> 
> "Hey you...!" Shouted angry Attilla
> 
> "SHUT UP!!!!" interrupted Luzbel "Let me speak, Attilla, you mess 
> all " and the dragon male said with his kindest tone "Well, it's 
> seems that you're a maximal, aren't you?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> > Panzer::
> > 
> > Muttering under her breath,"scrap!" She transformed into bot mode 
> and 
> > drew herside arm.  She stood up and took aim. Her sights moving 
> from 
> > one to the other. "I'd recommend you stop right there. I don't 
want 
> > to have to shoot you."
> > Actually, she wanted to shoot them just because they were preds. 
> But 
> > her maximal programming wouldn't allow her to shoot without a 
> > provoced attack. With the boulder shielding only 1/3rd of her 
body, 
> > she kept her ground.
